import axios from 'axios'; import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function AddUser() { let navigate=useNavigate() const [user,setUser] = useState({ name:"", username:"", email:"", sem1: "", sem2: "", sem3: "" }) const{name,username,email}=user const onInputChange=(e)=>{ setUser({...user,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}); }; const onSubmit=async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/user",user) navigate("/") } return
